articles.description: Former Gillingham boss Steve Evans says the club remains close to his heart - but one person does not.
articles.content:
Former Gillingham boss Steve Evans says the club remains close to his heart - but one person does not.
Evans will be bringing his table-topping Stevenage side to Gillingham this Saturday in what wil… [+3647 chars]
